## Load Packages

```{r packages}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r functions}
source(here::here("fitbit/takeout_fitbit_processing_functions.R"))
```

\newpage

# Explore some FitBit data
```{r}
#current path
data_path <- here::here("fitbit/sample_fitbit_takeout_data/9Aug25_groberts_fitbit_takeout/Fitbit")
print(data_path)
```

## Heart Rate Variablility
```{r}
# Combined detailed + summary
data <- load_fitbit_hrv("2025-07-29", "2025-07-30",
                        data_path)

# Only summary data
summary_only <- load_fitbit_hrv("2025-07-29", "2025-07-30",
                               data_path,
                               summary_only = TRUE)
```
